name: Bid To The Mysterious Cat God
name_original: Bid To The Mysterious Cat God
description:
WASD/Arrows to move . Shift to sprint . LMB to attack

As a canine adventurer who's fallen to monsters in a dungeon, you've been brought back from the edge of death by a mysterious magical feline. As repayment, he demands you fetch him the souls of baby chicks roaming the halls. Run around and claim as many souls as you can for this cat god, but be careful - the mama hens won't just let you slay their children in peace. How far can you make it before you meet the same fate as before?
